types.title: Note
types.description: A plain text post, similar to a tweet or status update.

types.title: Profile Update
types.description: An update to identity metadata like name, avatar, or bio.

types.title: Reaction
types.description: A lightweight emoji or symbol response to another event.

types.title: Boost
types.description: A repost or share of another event without additional commentary.

types.title: Zap
types.description: A microtip or payment event in response to content. Optional.
